If you are distributing an appliance, operating system or other kind of software using the NTP Pool, you need to setup a "vendor zone".

For internal use on systems you manage you do not need a vendor zone. For initial development or small-scale testing of an appliance or software, you don't either. However, you must setup a vendor zone before production deployments or distribution start.

For open source projects this is free; for commercial products (including commercial open source) we ask for a nomimal annual fee per 10,000 clients to support the NTP Pool Project infrastructure.

If you have any questions, please email [% "vendors" | email %].
